summary: Eighteenth-century Spanish Jesuits try to protect a remote South American tribe in danger of falling under the rule of pro-slavery Portugal.
cast: Robert De Niro|Jeremy Irons|Ray McAnally|Aidan Quinn|Cherie Lunghi|Ronald Pickup|Chuck Low|Liam Neeson|Bercelio Moya|Sigifredo Ismare|Asuncion Ontiveros|Alejandrino Moya|Daniel Berrigan|Rolf Gray|Álvaro Guerrero|Tony Lawn|Joe Daly|Carlos Duplat|Rafael Camerano|Monirak Sisowath|Silvestre Chiripua|Luis Carlos Gonzalez|Maria Teresa Ripoll|Alberto Borja|Alain Becerra Calderon|Jacques Des Grottes|Enrique Lamas|Fred Melamed|Antonio Segovia|Harlan Venner
title: La misión
